channel.description: Recent content in advertising on Damien Saunders | Management Marketing Consultant

item.title: Learning to use Google Adsense
item.description: Hi … if you’re looking at this in your RSS feed reader will now notice at the bottom of each post there is now a Google Adsense ad.

item.title: TV Advertising - T-Mobile & Heathrow T5
item.description: I’m the type who is always overwhelmed by TV advertising - as I don’t watch ‘live’ TV or commercial TV with ads I often find myself watching adverts on the internet for the sake of it!

item.title: How to include mobile marketing into your advertising
item.description: It’s easy to create effective mobile marketing campaigns using apps and games - this short video aims to demonstrate whats possible

item.title: Bill Gates & Jerry Seinfeld - everyones blogging that video
item.description: You can try to avoid watching this advert all you want - but you just got to know what it is that Bill and Jerry cooked up here in the Shoe Circus - Windows Vista advert
